title: EU car sales : share of diesel engines 2013 - 2017 , by brand
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 18 different Brands on X-axis for 2 groups 2013, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of passenger car sales.
Brand Volvo had the maximum Share of passenger car sales among all 2 groups, and it was for 2013. The minimum Share of passenger car sales was observed in Brand Toyota for 2017.
In Brand Volvo, 2013 had the maximum Share of passenger car sales and it saw the lowest in Brand Toyota out of all 18 Brands.
There is a gap of 61.0 between the highest and lowest Share of passenger car sales found for 2013 in Brand Volvo and Toyota.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 18 different Brands on X-axis for 2 groups 2013, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of passenger car sales.
In Brand Volvo, 2013 had the highest Share of passenger car sales 87.0 among the 2 groups and in Toyota, 2017 had the lowest Share of passenger car sales 8.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 18 different Brands on X-axis for 2 groups 2013, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of passenger car sales.
Brand Volvo had the maximum Share of passenger car sales among all 2 groups, and it was for 2013. The minimum Share of passenger car sales was observed in Brand Toyota for 2017.
In Brand Volvo, 2013 had the maximum Share of passenger car sales and it saw the lowest in Brand Toyota out of all 18 Brands.
There is a gap of 61.0 between the highest and lowest Share of passenger car sales found for 2013 in Brand Volvo and Toyota.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of passenger car sales on the Y-axis for 18 different Brands for 2 groups 2013, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Brand Volvo had the maximum Share of passenger car sales among all 2 groups, and it was for 2013. The minimum Share of passenger car sales was observed in Brand Toyota for 2017.
Among all the Brands, 2013 had the highest Share of passenger car sales in Brand Volvo and lowest Share of passenger car sales in Brand Toyota.
There is a gap of 61.0 between the highest and lowest Share of passenger car sales found for 2013 in Brand Volvo and Toyota.
Among all 2 groups, 2013 had the gap of 61.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of passenger car sales observed in Brand Volvo and Toyota respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups 2013, and 2017, the Brand Volvo is the maximum Share of passenger car sales and Toyota is the minimum Share of passenger car sales.
